metadata.title: CVE-2021-46195 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
GCC v12.0 was discovered to contain an uncontrolled recursion via thecomponent libiberty/rust-demangle.c. This vulnerability allows attackers tocause a Denial of Service (DoS) by consuming excessive CPU and memoryresources.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-46195` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cpp-12 - 12-20220319-1ubuntu1
g++-12 - 12-20220319-1ubuntu1
g++-12-multilib - 12-20220319-1ubuntu1
gcc-12 - 12-20220319-1ubuntu1

criterions.comment: gcc-11 package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
gcc-12 package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '12-20220319-1ubuntu1').
